title: List all the anime references you can find with Champs/Skins
body:
inspired by OB1iViON's post:
http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/4Kq6d9sU-el-tigre-braum-skin-concept

see how many Anime references you can find in any LoL champs/skins/lore
ill start with:

Riven's Ultimate is probably a reference to Inuyasha's sword that also has an attack mode where it grows in size and fires a 'Wind scar' similar to 
rivens 'Wind slash' an enemy of inuyasha is (spoiler) Sesshomaru who wants to kill inuyasha (his brother) to restore his honour, he is a wandering samurai who wears armour on only 1 shoulder very similar to Yasuo.

Katarina's 'Shunpo' is probably a reference to the Shunpo (flash step) from bleach, a mode of getting from one place to another so fast it looks just like a blink.

Irelia's 'Hiten style' is probably a reference to Rorouni Kenshin's 'Hiten Mitsurigi style' of sword fighting

See how many you can come up with/find, include pictures if you want.

replies.body: There's TPA ezreals(or Normal ezreals but to lazy to check) dance compared to the melancholy of haruhi Suzumiya
Galaxy rumble is a TTGL reference. the whole skin.

There aren't many things that is directly referencing anime/manga titles (Riot tends to reference a lot of film and game titles however though), but there are a few, yes.

Such as the ones already mentioned below, Galaxy Rumble is taken from TTGL, and Ezreal's dance is from Haruhi (Hare Hare Yukai).

I personally think Darius took a few notes from Berserk when they were creating him but maybe it's just me.

Although not exactly anime, Sona's appearance and theme are loosely based on the vocaloid Hatsune Miku.

Oh before I forget, Vel'koz, as in the appearance design concept huehuehuehuehuehuehuehuehuehuehue....

EDIT: I don't think Riven is actually a direct homage to animes, the name sake of Kat's Shunpo and Irelia's Hiten style (this one is debatable) are.
